title: Synthesis of 1,2,3-triazole-piperazin-benzo[b][1,4]thiazine 1,1-dioxides: antibacterial, hemolytic and in silico TLR4 protein inhibitory activities
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8921-8931
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07509E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nagavelli Ramu, Thupurani Murali Krishna, Ravikumar Kapavarapu, Sirassu Narsimha
Novel 1,2,3-triazoles (6a–6j & 8a–8g) were synthesized and evaluated for their antibacterial activity against S. aureus. The more potent compounds were further evaluated for their in silico TLR4 inhibitory activity.
